title: Benoît Gênant Officiel
overview: Benoît is the head of BG Immo, a small real estate agency in Puteaux. Benoît is unwavering in his positivity and future success. But his agency's accounts are in the red. He must react and has decided to modernize his sales and communication methods. And for this he will follow the teachings of his master of living and thinking: Stéphane Plaza.
